channel.title: Comments on: Kellner on Micah Goodman’s Maimonides
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Natan Ophir
item.dc:creator: Natan Ophir
item.description: It is the 4th, and not 3rd, Israeli Conference for the Study of Contemporary Spiritualities (ICSCS) at the University of Haifa (March 20th, 2012), and it is on contemporary spiritualities and not "new religious phenomena in Israel".
item.content:encoded: It is the 4th, and not 3rd, Israeli Conference for the Study of Contemporary Spiritualities (ICSCS) at the University of Haifa (March 20th, 2012), and it is on contemporary spiritualities and not “new religious phenomena in Israel”.

item.title: By: Jon
item.dc:creator: Jon
item.description: It's not readily obvious that the review is negative. You have to read between the lines.
item.content:encoded: It’s not readily obvious that the review is negative. You have to read between the lines.
